sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Mayoral Election Validation Act.

sections.heading: In any case in which, before the effective date of this Act, a city held
sections.text:
an election for mayor, such election is declared to be legal and valid
notwithstanding any failure to hold a special run-off election as provided
in Section 3-4-4 of the "Illinois Municipal Code" if the election was in
other respects in conformity with law.
